title: Consider the Lilies
description: A story of how the Lord taught me that He has a plan for my life, written before starting the World Race.

title: Goodbye Guatemala
description: A story of how the Lord used the events we hosted in Guatemala to heal the hearts of His people.

title: Silly Little Man-Made Limits
description: A story of how the Lord spoke to me through an experience with a child and healed my heart in Honduras.

title: Casa Esperanza - House of Hope
description: A story of the ways the Lord used my team at House of Hope, a shelter for women and children in Nicaragua.

title: To Be Treasured
description: A story of how the Lord showed me that He could use my creative gifts for His Kingdom in Nicaragua.

title: Shadrach, Putin, And My Super Cool Ukrainian Friend
alt: Shadrach, Putin, And My Super Cool Ukrainian Friend
description: A story of how the Lord used Shadrach and Putin to teach me about forgiveness.

title: Last Stop: Swaziland
description: A story of how the Lord used jewelry to share the gospel with children in Swaziland.

title: 27 Doctors, 21 Translators, 487 Prostitutes, & Me
description: A story of how the Lord used a medical brigade to share His love with almost 500 prostitutes in Nicaragua.
